abstract: In a live episode of "The X Factor," the addition of choreography results in what look like bad Broadway numbers.
snippet: In a live episode of "The X Factor," the addition of choreography results in what look like bad Broadway numbers.
lead_paragraph: Some welcome testiness finally worked its way into "The X Factor" on Tuesday night, but so did lots of unwelcome choreography, headache-inducing lighting and overorchestration. Some of the singers in this live show were more or less swallowed up by their absurdly excessive production numbers as "The X Factor" abandoned its roots as a singing competition and turned into something resembling a bad Broadway musical.

headline.main: 'X Factor' Watch: Squabbling and Dancing (and Some Singing), All of It Live
